resources.string: Please check your email you will receive a verification code via Email
If you didn\'t receive an email then click on resend email button

Plagiarism checker App is provided by prepostseo.com 

Using this App you can check plagiarism by selecting .docx, .pdf and .txt files. You can also type your own paragraph to check plagiarism. Our duplicate content checker app is useful for students and teachers to check their papers for plagiarism.

Plagiarism Checker scans your text or documents sentence by sentence and display results accordingly. 

Understanding Results: 

After Checking Completes, you will see two tabs “Overall Results” & “Sources”. In the first tab, you can check each sentence either it's plagiarized or unique. In the second tab, you can source from where content is copied.

What is a Query? 

A single search query is a sentence that is checked for plagiarism. e-g: if you check an article of 500 words it consumes 10-15 queries to check plagiarism. All Memberships / Plans are according to those queries.

Does this App checks every sentence? 

Our Plagiarism App checks each and every sentence carefully over the billions of web pages. We do not check your sentences randomly.

Is Content is checked saved anywhere? 

We respect our users, any article you check at prepostseo.com is 100% Safe & Secure. we do not share any of your content publicly. Also, we do not save your content in our database.

Can I use same login details to sign in at prepostseo.com 

Yes you can use same login details to sign in at prepostseo.com

If you need any help regarding our plagiarism checker App you can contact us at support@prepostseo.com
